hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.name: COLUMBO_BUILD
hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.description: Which Columbo build to use for the deploy and test.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
~/src/ckoenig/hudson/create_or_overwrite_yroot.sh columbo_test --i386 4.8-20090518 echo $COLUMBO_BUILD
yroot columbo_test --cmd "yinst install perlbase" yroot columbo_test --cmd "yinst install -br test ~/.hudson/jobs/columbo/lastStable/archive/pkg/yellowstone_columbo_perl-*.tgz" yroot columbo_test --cmd "~/src/ckoenig/hudson/columbo_syntax_check.sh"
scp ~/.hudson/jobs/columbo/lastStable/archive/pkg/yellowstone_columbo_perl-*.tgz af1183.yss.ac4.yahoo.com:/tmp/latest_columbo_package.tgz ssh af1183.yss.ac4.yahoo.com "sudo yinst install perlbase; sudo yinst install -br test /tmp/latest_columbo_package.tgz"
# ~/src/ckoenig/hudson/remove_yroot.sh columbo_test
